description: Describes a certificate provider. Requires permission to access the DescribeCertificateProvider action.

parameters.name: certificateProviderName
parameters.description: The name of the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: certificateProviderName
nested_items.description: The name of the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: certificateProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: lambdaFunctionArn
nested_items.description: The Lambda function ARN that's associated with the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: accountDefaultForOperations
nested_items.description: A list of the operations that the certificate provider will use to generate certificates. Valid value: CreateCertificateFromCsr.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date-time string that indicates when the certificate provider was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date-time string that indicates when the certificate provider was last updated.
